info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 5:13PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lea and west central Gaines Counties through 645 PM CDT/545 PM MDT/... At 613 PM CDT/513 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Humble City, or 8 miles west of Hobbs, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hobbs, Monument, Humble City, Industrial Airpark, Knowles and Lea County Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
